allowEnoughForAll: Di cukupkan untuk semua pembelian selanjutnya
choosingAllowAll: Memilih "Di cukupkan untuk semua pembelian selanjutnya" akan memberi izin untuk {{currencyName}} dengan jumlah berapa pun, tetapi ini cara bertransaksi yang kurang aman.
description: PoolTogether adalah gim finansial tabungan tanpa kerugian biasa kita kenal dengan arisan, PoolTogether telah diaudit dan berbasis teknologi blockchain
enterTheNumberOfTickets: Masukkan jumlah tiket yang anda ingin beli
getEmailsWhenPrizes: Dapatkan email saat hadiah telah di undi:
howMuchToSponsor: Berapa banyak yang anda ingin sponsori?
ifYouWithdraw: Jika saldo anda di tarik, Anda tidak lagi berhak atas hadiah {{estimasiPrize}} pada {{drawDate}}.
needHigherBalance: Anda membutuhkan lebih banyak {{currencyName}} untuk membeli tiket sebanyak itu
pleaseConfirmTheTransaction: Tolong konfirmasi transaksi di dompet anda
pleaseEnterAmountToSponsor: Tolong masukkan jumlah {{currencyName}} untuk di sponsor
pleaseLetUsKnow: We've been notified, but if it persists feel free to bring it up with us!
tryCoinbaseWalletMobile: On mobile try Coinbase Wallet or Trust.
lookingForSai: Looking for the SAI pool's prizes?
youHaveXTicketsInPod: You have {{podTickets}} Eligible tickets in the Pod that you can transfer to the Pool
youHaveXTicketsInPool: You have {{poolTickets}} Eligible tickets in the Pool that you can transfer to the Pod
podDescription: The Pod is a group of players who have joined their tickets together to have better odds of winning the prize. Each player gets a share of the prize equal to how much they put in.
leavePodDescription: These tickets are part of the Pod, a group of players who have joined tickets together for a better chance of winning. You can choose to transfer your Pod tickets back to the main Pool and compete on your own.
ownYourPrivateKeys: You own your private keys and you confirm when to spend your funds
youAreNotCurrentlyInPool: You are not currently in this pool
enterAmountOfTickets: Enter amount of tickets to withdraw
transferringXTicketsToPool: Transferring {{numTickets}} grouped {{currencyName}} ticket(s) from Pod to Pool
transferringXTicketsToPod: Transferring {{numTickets}} Solo {{currencyName}} ticket(s) from Pool to Pod
shareDescription: The amount you win if the Pod wins
youHaveNumTicketsPool: You have {{numTickets}} Solo ticket(s) in the Pool
youHaveNumTicketsPod: You have {{numTickets}} grouped ticket(s) in the Pod
youreBuyingNTicketsToPool: You're buying {{numTickets}} Solo ticket(s) to the Pool
youreBuyingNTicketsToPod: You're buying {{numTickets}} grouped ticket(s) to the Pod
ptRequiresPermissionPool: PoolTogether requires your approval to transact {{currencyName}} with the Pool
ptRequiresPermissionPod: PoolTogether requires your approval to transact {{currencyName}} with the Pod
withdrawHowManySolo: Withdraw how many solo tickets from the Pool?
withdrawHowManyPod: Withdraw how many grouped tickets from the Pod?
youWithdrewXFromPool: You withdrew {{numTickets}} ticket(s) from your solo {{currencyName}} Pool ticket(s)
youWithdrewXFromPod: You withdrew {{numTickets}} ticket(s) from your grouped {{currencyName}} Pod ticket(s)
youTransferredXFromPool: You transferred {{numTickets}} {{currencyName}} Solo Pool ticket(s) to Pod ticket(s)
youTransferredXFromPod: You transferred {{numTickets}} {{currencyName}} Pod ticket(s) to Solo Pool ticket(s)
addTicketsToGroup: Increase my odds by grouping my tickets and sharing the prize
onlyEligibleTicketsTransfer: Currently only tickets which have existed longer than one prize duration can be transferred. Tickets purchased before the prize cannot be transferred.
whatIsThisEligible: What is this "Eligible" and where are my tickets?
ethIsTheMain: ETH is the main Ethereum currency, and currently it is required to pay for transactions on PoolTogether.
youCanPurchaseEth: You can purchase ETH on Wyre using your Debit Card or Apple Pay (Safari / iOS-only) right now:
forMoreInfoPleaseVisit: For more info please visit our help center to learn about acquiring ETH:
sitTightYourCurrencyPurchase: Sit tight! Your {{currencyName}} purchase transaction is being confirmed ...
errorCurrencyPurchase: There was an error confirming your purchase of {{currencyName}} - please try again
depositDaiToGetTickets: Deposit Dai into the pool to get tickets. Each ticket is a chance to win weekly prizes! For every 1 Dai you deposit you get 1 ticket.
readToLearnMoreAboutDai: Read this to learn more about Dai
allDaiInPoolEarnsInterest: All the Dai in the pool earns interest. The prizes are funded solely by the interest earned.
atTheEndOfTheWeek: At the end of the week one lucky person wins all of the interest that accrues!
whetherYouWinOrNotGetMoneyBack: Whether you win or not you get all of your money back! You can withdraw your savings and winnings at any time.
readyToGiveShot: Ready to give it a shot?
enterAnAmountOfTickets: Enter an amount of tickets to see your odds of winning
youCanNowPurchaseTickets: You can now purchase tickets with your new currency
